data.name: (Early Access Optional) Dudes on a Map: Game Master
data.detailed_description:
Dudes on a Map will be releasing for FREE on May 6th, under the Early Access Program. During that time, the Game Master module will be made available for purchase as a way to support the program, I don't plan on charging for Dudes until the second half of 2021, as I'd rather have the program available to those in need than having cost be a barrier to people trying out a new approach to their regular game, or just trying something new.


Dudes on a Map: Game Master Suite is used by a single game master within a group to share maps and encounter details with the players in a Tabletop RPG. Dudes is a great option for playing online, or mixing remote and at-the-table players, as the minimalist approach to rules allows multiple players per PC, and joint player and DM views.

Only the Game Master within a group will ever need to have this paid DLC; all of your players can join any game you create using the free Base Game.
